document_data.name: Perdita
document_data.home: [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Perdita''' ({{Pronounce|PUR|di|ta|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Beneath the City of the Dead|7,10-11,19}}
document_data.Description: Perdita was the ghost of a young [[human]] girl who lost her life while exploring a crypt with her older sister. Perdita looked as if she was wearing a simple tunic, breeches and a moon-pendant. She wore two braids in her black hair.
document_data.Personality: Perdita was terrified of [[rat]]s. Deceased while about 8 years old, her [[soul]] was unable to pass on due to concerns over her sister's well-being.
